This demo shows how you can specify slices (arrays) 

|script           |Array                                 |
|Set Int Array    |[1, 2, 3, 5, 8, 13]                   |
|check            |int array    |[1, 2, 3, 5, 8, 13]     |
|Set String Matrix|[[a, b, c], [d, e], [f]]              |
|check            |String Matrix|[[a, b, c], [d, e], [f]]|
|Set Int Array    |[1, 2, 3, a, 8, 13]                   |

This last one shows how slim4go deals with conversion errors
